column5:
I can 100% relate to you. My constant dissociation has caused me to be unaware and reckless whilst growing up. 
I feel so blank and emotionless. I lack motivation and I've dealt with depression from derealization.
 I can never catch a break. My derealisation has gotten worse as well, it merges with depersonalization now.

I just hope it will go away as well for you.
But its good to know that i'm not alone with this.
I usually know before i start to relapse. But i still freak out if i feel down, if its only a reaction
